titleStmt.title: An acte to auoyde a decree in Chancery there made, betvveene one Francis Verzelline, sonne and heire of Iacob Verzelline the elder, plaintiffe; and Peter Manning, Michaell Pallmer, and their wiues, daughters of the sayde Iacob the elder, and others, defendants.
titleStmt.author: Manning, Peter, fl. 1621.

notesStmt.note: Brief of a bill in Parliament favouring the defendants. The bill was read 24 Apr. 1621 and committed 17 May 1621. Cf. STC.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
